plot: After the death of his mother, twelve- year- old Henry moves in with his wealthy aunt, but he rejects all affection and renounces his passion for playing the piano.
title: The Stone on the Shore
plot_es: After the death of his mother, twelve- year- old Henry moves in with his wealthy aunt, but he rejects all affection and renounces his passion for playing the piano.
plot_en: After the death of his mother, twelve- year- old Henry moves in with his wealthy aunt, but he rejects all affection and renounces his passion for playing the piano.
